action.program_description: The main program shown is the Outlook email client.
action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows an Outlook email client open in a web browser. The user has received an email with the subject "Box size change request" from "isseki". The email body starts with "Hi, The boxes you use for the ship...".  The user has not selected any emails to read and has no emails in focus.
action.mouse_action: The mouse cursor is hovering near the top right corner of the browser window, likely near the close or minimize buttons.
